review: Love it! Glad I went with this over the other options.
author: Darin Zaugg

review: Really enjoy the options. Haven't tried but a few, however it meets all expectations I had for sure... Just make sure your internet is pretty fast.. Even tho ours is crummy... Fire stick works great!
author: plm6846

review: Really enjoy my fire stick. I can always find something worth watching. Love revisiting old favorite shows.
author: James Jauregui

review: I picked this up this morning and am thoroughly impressed with how easy set up was! Plugged it in, grabbed the remote, and laid on the couch while I browsed movies and TV shows! Now, the movie rentals I wouldn't bother with if you got redbox near by. Triple the price on Amazon. Everything is working perfectly and all the apps will keep me entertained since I don't have cable :)Which is the whole point Eh?
author: tiffrenee

review: Amazon absolutely hit it out of the park with this product.  Netflix + Youtube + HBO + Amazon Prime, needless to say we cut the cord on Time Warner Cable.  We have a chromecast that is collecting dust.  This is the way to go if you want to smarten your television set.
author: Youngrin L. Kim

review: unit used on bedroom TV and we can watch  Prime videos whenever we feel like it.
author: guytok1

review: It's easy. Amazon does all the work just by clicking a button. It's different and most of all fun.
author: Ron

review: I thoroughly enjoy the easy installation and operation of unit
author: James Fisher

review: CONTROLLER DIRECTION DIAL A LITTLE SMALL
author: ASE1950
